issues.description: The problem text specifies that the helper method singFarmSongVerse(Animal animal) should be public, but both the template and solution declare it as private. This visibility mismatch conflicts with the instruction for testing and may confuse students about the required access level.
issues.suggested_fix: Either change the method in the template and solution to public, or update the problem text to reflect that it is private. To preserve testing instructions, it is recommended to declare singFarmSongVerse as public in both template and solution.

issues.description: The template stub for singFarmSongVerse defines no method parameter (empty parentheses), whereas the problem specification and solution expect a single Animal parameter. This parameter mismatch will prevent students from compiling and correctly implementing the verse helper.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the template stub signature to include the parameter: `public void singFarmSongVerse(Animal animal)` (or at least `void singFarmSongVerse(Animal animal)`), matching the specification and solution.
